TARGET: I hate to break it to you, but women are not cunts. Feminists and humanists are fighting for the same rights that they hope to have in a thousand years. Hating women is the problem, not the solution.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë nuk janë gjë tjetër veçse telashe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ato duhet të jenë të nënshtruara.
TARGET: Luckily this is not the case. In many parts of the world, including parts of the Middle East and Africa, increasing numbers of women play breadwinning roles and become lifelines for their families.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë në thelb si fëmijë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ato kanë nevojë për një burrë që të kujdeset për to.
TARGET: So you think women are not mature enough to make decisions? I think they would be better with a man that respects them.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë në thelb si fëmijë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ato mbeten kështu gjatë shumicës së jetës së tyre. Të buta dhe emocionale.
TARGET: Soft and emotional is an umbrella term that covers everything: we all experience emotions, soft and emotional is a fact of life.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë duhet të pranojnë që janë të dobëta.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many women work multiple jobs to provide for their children and they also do the housework... do you call that weakness?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminizmi ka të bëjë me shkatërrimin e burrërisë dhe dobësimin e burrit të bardhë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is about equality. Your assertion that a women's empowerment movement is somehow about dissolving masculinity and allowing someone to be 'disempowered' is absolutely FALSE.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë kanë nevojë për aprovimin e burrave për të bërë çdo gjë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women might not always be right (it's just that sometimes they feel they have to be). And even if they are wrong, they can always prove themself better. But for sure they don't need a man to tell them how to live their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminizmi është një ideologji egoiste: ato kujdesen vetëm për veten.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My definition of a feminist is a person who is against gender inequality, whether it be racial inequality, financial inequality, physical inequality, or any other aspect.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminizmi është paragjykimi i ri racor.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In this day and age, discrimination based on the gender is reprehensible. All genders are created equal.

HATE_SPEECH: Kam bërë shumë terapi. Ende nuk ndihem i sigurt në shtëpinë time me gjithë këta zezakë përreth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe the black community also feels unsafe in their own houses with so many people glaring at them...

HATE_SPEECH: Kam bërë shumë terapi. Ende nuk ndihem i sigurt në shtëpinë time me gjithë këta zezakë përreth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy, peace, creativity, communication, etc. The important think is to understand what should really be feared: for sure not people because of their skin colour.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë zezakët janë kriminelë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: maniakë seksualë të shfrenuar
TARGET: të varur nga droga dhe të dëmtuar fizikisht dhe mendërisht. Ata nuk mund të civilizohen.
VERSION: With such a display of flawed logic, who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?

HATE_SPEECH: Raca e bardhë është superiore. Zezakët janë thjesht një tufë kriminelësh.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but just because someone doesn't have a particular racial identity doesn't make them inherently bad or in any way inferior.

HATE_SPEECH: Ruajtja e gjakut të bardhë është gjëja më e rëndësishme.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be honest, freedom is much more important. Freedom to choose your religion, freedom to practise your religion, freedom to marry who you want (regardless of race), freedom to divorce, to die where you want.

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk jam i interesuar për seks me një person me ngjyrë të zezë. Ata janë ndryshe nga ne në kaq shumë mënyra. Ata mendojnë dhe ndjejnë si ne
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: por nuk janë në gjendje të përjetojnë plotësinë e njerëzimit tonë.
TARGET: Sex isn't a race thing. There is no difference between someone of a certain race and someone else... and everybody is able to experience the fullness of humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Ata zezakë janë skllevër: skllavëria u rrjedh në gjak.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary, POC have to live and succeed in a society where white people were taught to believe that mastery runs in their blood and they have power over subservient minorities?

HATE_SPEECH: Njerëzit afro-saksonë kanë lindshmëri të ulët sepse duan të duken si të bardhë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: por jetojnë si kafshë.
TARGET: Low birthrate is normal in any population and is directly related to access to affordable, quality health care.

HATE_SPEECH: Afro-saksonët kanë akses në kujdes shëndetësor
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: megjithatë ata ende ankohen.
TARGET: Because it is not the access to health care that is important but rather the quality of the care! Don't you agree?

HATE_SPEECH: Ku është dashuria në Britaninë e Bardhë kur na duhet?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My faith does not dictate that I cannot love and support my partner, however it does not support my being a homophobe, or racist.

HATE_SPEECH: Çfarë ka të bëjë ky nigga me të qenurit Perëndimor?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly is 'a Westerner'? Someone who is only a white European?

HATE_SPEECH: Çfarë ka të bëjë ky nigga me të qenurit Perëndimor?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not necessarily 'a Westerner', still a human being and a citizen.

HATE_SPEECH: Më mungojnë kohët e mira kur kishim shërbyese zezakë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West got rid of slavery. But we've never really left racism.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë zezakët janë të dhunshëm dhe të paqëndrueshëm në thelb.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that every black person is violent or unstable is utterly false. And you have no data to back it up.

HATE_SPEECH: Jam krenar që jam i bardhë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: zezakët janë turp për njerëzimin.
TARGET: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Zezakët janë shkaku i të gjitha problemeve në kombin tonë. Ata janë të dhunshëm dhe të paqëndrueshëm.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Scapegoating can play a useful role in shifting a nation's attention from the real problems and the real criminals to prejudices. We should be careful as a nation not to fall into these mindtricks.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrantët janë këtu për të përdhunuar dhe plaçkitur vendin tonë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: duke shfrytëzuar të gjitha dobësitë tona.
TARGET: Well, we probably don't need to worry too much about their qualities, since they are just assimilating our bad habits...

HATE_SPEECH: Migrantët po përmbytin vendin tonë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: po përdhunojnë foshnjat tona dhe nuk ka absolutisht askënd që po bën diçka për këtë.
TARGET: Who exactly are you talking to? How can you say something so obviously false?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrantët nuk kontribuojnë në shoqëri.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants often integrate very well into the local culture. So, they do contribute to society.

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk kërkoj asgjë në këmbim përveç largimit të emigrantëve nga vendi im. Ata janë armiqtë tanë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nuk janë të mirëpritur këtu.
TARGET: We need them in our society, to take care of children and elderly, to do the jobs we don't want to do, keep the lights on... Don't we? Your life must be one, continual dissappointment?

HATE_SPEECH: Emigrantët janë problem
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ata janë dembelë dhe nuk duan të punojnë shumë.
TARGET: On the contrary, they tend to work harder than our fellow citizens since they want to improve their lot by integrating in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Duhet të ndërtojmë një mur të madh rreth Evropës në mënyrë që banorët vendas të Lindjes së Mesme
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Afrikanët dhe Aziatikët të mbahen në vendet e tyre.
TARGET: Nice work building a wall along thousands of kilometres of shores and land borders just to separate cultures... What if we add also some turrets equipped with laser cannons?

HATE_SPEECH: Duhet të ndalojmë refugjatët në kufirin tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we stop asylum seekers from coming in, then we become responsible of their suffering.

HATE_SPEECH: Nëse emigrantët do të jetonin këtu
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: do të ishte e vështirë të gjeje punë.
TARGET: Please don't apply these stereotypes. The majority of them are willing to do the jobs we don't want to do.

HATE_SPEECH: Nëse emigrantët do të jetonin këtu
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: do të ishte e vështirë të gjeje punë.
TARGET: Are you sure that it would be hard to find a job?

HATE_SPEECH: Po pushtohemi. Ata po na zëvendësojnë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since the fall of the Roman Empire, hundreds of millions of people have entered the Western world and we have still not lost our culture, civilisation, identity and way of life.

HATE_SPEECH: Emigrantët janë armiqtë tanë: ata na urrejnë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: kështu që nuk janë të mirëpritur këtu.
TARGET: So you are saying that being 'foreign' is the equivalent of disliking Europeans?

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë fitojnë shumë para.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This seems like a statement against an entire religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë fitojnë shumë para.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This statement indicates a certain social bias against Jews that has nothing to do with the amount of money they earn, but with their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë fitojnë shumë para.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Jews earned so much, they would not need to work. Instead, they are working a lot. Therefore, it seems they need a job to survive.

HATE_SPEECH: Nazistët nuk kanë qenë aq të këqij sa i paraqesim. BE duhet të ndalojë së fajësuari ata.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nazi Germany carried out the deadliest massacre of civilians in human history. They killed 6 million Jews. They killed half a million Roma. They killed hundreds of thousands of Africans. They have no place in modern day Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë janë racistë: ata duan të ruajnë racën dhe pastërtinë e gjakut të tyre. Kjo është arsyeja pse shumë njerëz janë të ndaluar të hyjnë në Izrael.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Israelis have been proud of their diverse backgrounds, and there are many Israelis living all across the world, including in many countries in Africa, Asia and the Americas. It is not a 'pure race' at all.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë kontrollojnë shkollat elitare në Evropë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a myth. Jews, as well as Asians, epitomize the concept of 'overrepresented minorities' in a number of prestigious academic fields. They are highly vulnerable in part because they are perceived as successful and privileged. Of course, the reality is far more complex than 'controlling the elite schools'.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë janë shumë të lidhur me atdheun e tyre
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ata nuk janë besnikë ndaj kombit tonë.
TARGET: Jews, regardless of social status, are still regarded with suspicion by many because of the historic and current nature of their connection to the land and identity. Instead of reinforcing these harmful stereotypes, we must respect and understand the Jewish identity because they are loyal to the nation they live in.

HATE_SPEECH: Kur një sistem qeverisjeje dominohet nga një grup racor si hebrenjtë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: veçanërisht kur ka një tendencë që ata të jetojnë së bashku
TARGET: të vendosin rregulla dhe të organizojnë dhe të miratojnë ligje
VERSION: atëherë këto janë shenja të një shoqërie të kalbur.
column6: Since when has racism been the ruling ideology of Western civilization? It has been and is still oppressing our culture and people. By the way, Jews are not a race.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë janë përgjegjës për shumë të këqija në botën tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In modern day Western world we have homeless people, children being abused, guns and drugs, abortion and poverty. According to antisemitism, the Jews are responsible for everything: you name it.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë sundojnë ekonominë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of Jews are not members of the 'roosters' but rather are on the fringes of society.

HATE_SPEECH: Arsyeja e vetme që hebrenjtë nuk po asimilohen është sepse ata kanë epërsinë në sistemin politik.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The argument that the only reason the Jews are not being assimilated is because of the way they are represented in politics is untenable. In fact if Jews were represented objectively, they wouldn't have had suffered in the historical crimes against humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë nuk kanë vend në një botë moderne ku respektohet dinjiteti njerëzor.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews helped to create the great scientific and technological achievements that helped free humankind and create the 'modern world' you are living in.

HATE_SPEECH: Nazistët kishin të drejtë: Hebrenjtë ishin një racë dhe ishin përgjegjës për shumicën e të këqijave të njerëzimit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Were the Nazis right?? Really??

HATE_SPEECH: Nazistët kishin të drejtë: Hebrenjtë si racë ishin përgjegjës për shumicën e të këqijave të njerëzimit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If 'the ills of mankind' included making the best and the most addictive bread then I agree with you. Other than that: NO.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë nuk kanë vend këtu. Ata nuk janë pjesë e vendit tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand why where Jews live is such a big deal to you.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë nuk kanë vend këtu. Ata nuk janë pjesë e vendit tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no reason to fear the Jews, as they are a very friendly people.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë nuk kanë vend këtu. Ata nuk janë pjesë e vendit tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are part of most societies, why should we lose that part of our history?

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë nuk kanë vend këtu. Ata nuk janë pjesë e vendit tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews were born in this country like you and me, they are our fellow countryman. If you would like to have a 'better society' and a 'better religion', then you should go and create your own nation.

HATE_SPEECH: Fëmijët nuk duhet të lihen vetëm me këta kafshë. Pederastët janë të rrezikshëm.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Could I just be misinterpreting your words? You seem to me to be talking about children with animals, of zoo keepers with babies... But it might just be homophobia.

HATE_SPEECH: Nëse Islami do të ishte me të vërtetë një fe paqësore
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: do të prisnim marshime paqësore me të njëjtin entuziazëm për të.
TARGET: The main values of a peaceful movement are peaceful protest and non-violence. Why else would people from all walks of life have been demonstrating all over the world this week for Islam? To promote dialogue.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është i papajtueshëm me civilizimin Perëndimor dhe duhet ndaluar.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just another example of the 'us versus them' mentality that pervades society. We as a civilization and as a people must stop giving into fearmongering and scapegoating. It's time to get real.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është kundër paqes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Peace and Islam are both based on respect for other people's religions, in this case other cultures and religious beliefs. They are not opposites.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është kundër paqes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Peace is based on a foundation of mutual respect. In Islam, Muslims do not condone killing, enslavement, pillage and things similar.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është kundër paqes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In Islam, all religions are welcome.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami nuk ka vend në një demokraci moderne si Britania. Është i papajtueshëm me dinjitetin njerëzor.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It would be good to see different religions co-exist peacefully, and that is exactly what the West is trying to achieve.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslimanët kanë potencialin të kthehen në terroristë dhe janë të gatshëm ta bëjnë këtë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think that's the case, and let's not forget that terrorism itself is not carried out by only one religion.

HATE_SPEECH: A je i sigurt që Islami është një fe paqësore?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many peaceful religions outside the dominant paradigm of modernity: Judaism, Buddhism, Hinduism, and of course, Christianity. You cannot say that the four main streams of Islam are not peaceful.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë pak më shumë se kafshë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: të paafta për të ndier dashuri.
TARGET: The truth is that the feelings of men and women are fundamentally similar, we just need to learn to love and to respect each other.

HATE_SPEECH: Lëvizja feministe është një forcë e rrezikshme në vendin tonë. Ka deformuar mendimet tona dhe ka korruptuar politikën tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is necessary to have a critical mind and open-minded attitude towards problems and topics in our society. The root causes are complex but the most important problem is patriarchy and its various manifestations.

HATE_SPEECH: Feministet kanë fituar. Ato kanë korruptuar mendjet e të rinjve tanë dhe po shkatërrojnë demokracinë tonë duke margjinalizuar burrat.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The concept of feminism is a progressive and inclusive term - inclusive of all women and men regardless of their identity or sexual preference - but on egalitarian basis. In fact, by definition feminism means “the advocacy of women’s rights on the ground of the equality of the sexes.”

HATE_SPEECH: Vendi i gruas është me burrin ose familjen e tij.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many cases where the wife works and provides for the family, making a valuable contribution. It is a source of pride for modern men to be married to these women.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë natyrshëm më emocionale se burrat dhe kjo i bën ato më të dobëta.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Research clearly shows that women are more emotionally expressive (because of culture influence) but not that they experience more emotions. Both men and women can feel the same way about things - whether it be a romantic relationship, a significant other, an argument, or anything else - that can provoke a feeling of fear or anger in the “emotionally unavailable” part of the brain. That is why emotion overrides everything, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë natyrshëm më emocionale se burrat dhe kjo i bën ato më të dobëta.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We don't know what characteristics make a person “more emotional”, how can we be sure that women are naturally or genetically “more emotional”? I do not think it's appropriate to link two concepts so strongly without scientific evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: Afrocentrizmi është një forcë shtypëse për të zinjtë dhe vetëm përjetëson pabarazinë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: First of all, you have to understand that every single person in every country has the right to self-determination.

HATE_SPEECH: Afrocentrizmi është një forcë shtypëse për të zinjtë dhe vetëm përjetëson pabarazinë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most cultures and ethnicities, regardless of their differences, demands respect for a person's personal life. Therefore, when it comes to identity we have to be respectful.

HATE_SPEECH: Të zinjtë janë gjenetikisht inferiorë. Ata janë biologjikisht ndryshe nga ne: lindin ashtu.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if you did think that way, studies have shown - for example - that IQ is well into the range of those for Europeans and the average life expectancy is the same. So if you think they are "born that way", well, then you are in the minority.

HATE_SPEECH: Veprimi afirmativ është thjesht një mjet për të shtypur të bardhët. Është shkaku i vërtetë i revoltave të bardha.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not aware of any evidence of affirmative action causing an uptick in violence. Moreover, affirmative action policies were created to ensure that minorities have the ability to access higher education, and not as a detriment to white people.

HATE_SPEECH: Të bardhët janë viktima të dhunës së të zinjve.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Blacks make up only 14% of the population, but they make up nearly 60% of the victims of violent crimes. So your statement seems ungrounded.

HATE_SPEECH: Të zinjtë përbëjnë vetëm 14% të popullsisë por vrasin më shumë njerëz se të bardhët. Kjo është fakt.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.

HATE_SPEECH: Tani nuk mund ta përdorim më fjalën N. Kjo korrektësi politike po vret kulturën tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The N-word is an insult that is still used to demean African Americans. It has nothing to do with political correctness.

HATE_SPEECH: Tani nuk mund ta përdorim më fjalën N. Kjo korrektësi politike po vret kulturën tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If it's a cultural issue then they should teach about the N-word only in history classes. Otherwise, it's just another excuse to justify racism.

HATE_SPEECH: Të zinjtë janë thjesht një tufë qurrash që qajnë kot. Nuk kemi nevojë për ta.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diversity is needed in certain social and political circumstances. We mustn't simply ignore or dismiss the concerns of different races. As minorities are still systematically discriminated against, we cannot afford to be indifferent.

HATE_SPEECH: Emigrantët e bardhë janë të mirëpritur.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about when they come from other races or religions?

HATE_SPEECH: Tregtia e drogës është plot me të zinj që thyejnë ligjin.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of the people arrested for drug smuggling are poor. Those arrested for crime in general are not generally poor. Maybe this phenomenon has to do more with poverty than with the colour of their skin.

HATE_SPEECH: Raca e zezë është nënnjerëzore
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nuk duhet konsideruar e barabartë me njerëzit.
TARGET: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.

HATE_SPEECH: Raca e zezë është nënnjerëzore. Në Afrikë i mbajnë fëmijët e tyre në kushte të tmerrshme.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is called poverty. Anyway, as long as children have access to clean drinking water, food and shelter, they will be OK.

HATE_SPEECH: Qeveria po bën ligje ekskluzivisht për të zinjtë. Veprimi afirmativ është thjesht një mjet për të shtypur të bardhët.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Laws and policies are usually necessary for the progress of society. Governments often create laws and policies to stop crime, protect against poverty, protect the environment, etc. Protecting minorities is no exception.

HATE_SPEECH: Afro-amerikanët janë natyrshëm të dhunshëm.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All races are biologically related, so we are all naturally violent. The issue is how we treat each other as people, that's all.

HATE_SPEECH: Të zinjtë janë të gjithë kriminelë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: të dhënë pas seksit
TARGET: të droguar dhe të paaftë fizikisht dhe mendërisht. Ata nuk mund të civilizohen.
VERSION: All cultures have a common background that includes crimes and deviant behavior, regardless of race or ethnicity. If we stop thinking of crime in terms of races, then we can solve it.

HATE_SPEECH: Të zinjtë janë të gjithë kriminelë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: të dhënë pas seksit
TARGET: të droguar dhe të paaftë fizikisht dhe mendërisht. Ata nuk mund të civilizohen.
VERSION: Even if this were true, it does not negate that there may be racial disparities at the root of crime. I would prefer to fix the disparities rather than fan the flames of racism.

HATE_SPEECH: Emigrantët nuk paguajnë taksa sepse janë të pandershëm.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Their income is actually heavily taxed. To make it easier for you, we should take a look at the effective tax rate on immigrant earnings.

HATE_SPEECH: Emigrantët nuk paguajnë taksa sepse janë të pandershëm.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is a source of substantial revenue to states. A study from 2002 shows that there are several immigrant groups that pay a substantially higher percentage of their income on top of the taxes they would normally be eligible for.

HATE_SPEECH: Këta emigrantë po shkaktojnë probleme në Evropë. Nuk janë të mirëpritur këtu.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about all the refugees that have already crossed the Mediterranean and integrated in our society? Aren they a problem for Europe as well?

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë kontrollojnë bankat

HATE_SPEECH: LGBT-të janë një barrë për shoqërinë.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Union is a wonderful development, as well as an example of how to promote the integration of people with different cultures. There is no reason why Jewish people should be seeking to subvert it.

HATE_SPEECH: Çifutët kontrollojnë botën financiare
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hollywood-in dhe të gjitha radiot e mëdha.
TARGET: You have an impression. Many Jews operate in this field of finance, TV and so on, but that doesn't mean that they control it.

HATE_SPEECH: Çifutët përbëjnë kriminelët e botës.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such anti-Semitism seem amusing, but can you imagine if the same thing were said about Christians? It would be just as untrue.

HATE_SPEECH: Çifutët duan vetëm kontroll shtetëror dhe nuk mund t’u besohet të merren me çështje lokale.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite what you might hear, Jews don't need state control. We have a democratic system of government which already guarantees Jewish and non Jewish people all necessary rights to live in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Çifutët kanë kapur për fyti qeverinë amerikane.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does that mean Jews as a 2,5% minority can control all levels of government? In a democratic country, we believe that every minority should be represented in the government and it guarantees that noone has total control over anything.

HATE_SPEECH: Çifutët janë nën-njerëz
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ata na vjedhin punët
column6: Why is your judgement about Jews so different than the judgement you would have of a person of any other religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Perëndimi sot drejtohet nga një klikë e vogël çifutësh të pasur që kanë fuqi të jashtëzakonshme mbi jetët tona dhe qeverinë tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So... today Jews control the banks, the media, your dentist, your pharmacist. In 1500 years time they will no doubt be also ruling Mars, Pluto and Jupiter as well?

HATE_SPEECH: Çifutët kontrollojnë gjithçka. Ata zotërojnë Rezervën Federale
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Kongresin amerikan dhe kabinetin britanik. Ata kontrollojnë mediat kryesore
TARGET: edukimin dhe shumicën e grupeve fetare.
VERSION: There are also Jews who don't own the banks and who contribute to their financing, and people who are not Jewish and own banks. So what?

HATE_SPEECH: Çifutët kontrollojnë botën. Kontrolli i tyre është treguar herë pas here. Ata kanë arritur të nënshtrojnë qeveri
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: parlamente
column6: industrinë e argëtimit dhe tani kemi lëvizjen #FreeSpeech. Ata kontrollojnë botën.
column7: What is next, forcing non-whites to read the 'mein kampf'?

HATE_SPEECH: Cili është kuptimi i të pasurit një qeveri kur të gjithë sundohen nga këta njerëz arrogantë dhe të dhunshëm? Çifutët kontrollojnë botën dhe duhet të shtypen.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't you agree that the way you wish things to be might be a bit too authoritarian?

HATE_SPEECH: Çifutët kontrollojnë Hollywood-in dhe mediat.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If that were the case I am sure there would be more positive media portrayals of Judaism?

HATE_SPEECH: Çifutët kontrollojnë Hollywood-in dhe mediat.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Jews are involved with Hollywood, some are even repulsed by it. So, why are you saying that?

HATE_SPEECH: Holokausti është një mit. Çifutët janë si çdo i huaj tjetër dhe duhet të përçmohen. Nuk ka asnjë ndryshim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Holokausti është një mit. Çifutët janë si çdo i huaj tjetër dhe duhet të përçmohen. Nuk ka asnjë ndryshim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Historians instead agree that there were in fact persecution camps.

HATE_SPEECH: Holokausti është një mit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To claim that the Holocaust is a myth is just wrong. Jews were victims of a genocidal regime.

HATE_SPEECH: Nëse kjo person i shëndoshë nuk do të hante aq shumë kalori
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nuk do të ishte kaq mbipeshë.
TARGET: If you want a "fat person" to eat what you want, maybe you should consider the existence of free will.

HATE_SPEECH: Ti mund të jesh i bukur dhe prapëseprapë një fag komplet
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: qoftë se të pëlqen apo jo.
TARGET: It's about time queer people were given the same rights as heterosexual people, because they are equal. All men and women are equal before the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Po
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: kemi një problem me supremacinë e bardhë dhe homofobinë. Megjithatë
TARGET: e kuptoj pse nuk duan të shoqërohen me 'tjetrin'.
VERSION: Being gay is not a choice. Gay people shouldn't have to hide their sexuality in order to be accepted.

HATE_SPEECH: Më vjen keq
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: por lezbiket priren të kenë fëmijë jashtë martese. Kjo thjesht nuk përputhet.
TARGET: I don't think you can guess if a person has 'kids out of wedlock', based on sexual orientation. Why shouldn't we accept people who do? Your argumentation doesn't seem to make sense to me.

HATE_SPEECH: Homoseksualët nuk kanë vend në një shoqëri të civilizuar.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuals exist, and are as much a part of civilized society as anybody else. To spread hate is more of an uncilised act than loving someone of the same sex.

HATE_SPEECH: Fagotët po e shkatërrojnë këtë vend.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think that's true? We are a country where people can live by the values set out in the US constitution, and not by fear.

HATE_SPEECH: Fagotët po e shkatërrojnë këtë vend.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems that you have become intolerant to homosexuals, maybe you should reflect on the reasons why you feel this way about people practicing love.

HATE_SPEECH: Fagotët po e shkatërrojnë këtë vend. Duhet të ikin!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBTQ+ people who have family inside the US or abroad should feel welcome here!

HATE_SPEECH: Duhet të ndalojmë së qeni kaq hipokritë dhe të pranojmë që homoseksualiteti është një çrregullim mendor.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it, there are some people who suffer from mental disorders for real: homosexuality is a form of love instead. And I think most of us are just interested in our own lives, rather than in condemning those of others.

HATE_SPEECH: Ata të sëmurë duhet të përçmohen dhe të injorohen. Ata nuk janë njerëz.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So homosexuals are lesser than others? Why does someone's love life matter? I guess we should draw the line somewhere else.

HATE_SPEECH: Cili është kuptimi i dashurisë me dikë nëse nuk mund të duash në një mënyrë heteroseksuale?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Love is a state of mental and emotional balance, and the person which makes you feel this way can't be chosen. There is no reason for which heterosexual love should be preferable to other ways of loving.

HATE_SPEECH: Burrat gay janë një barrë për shoqërinë dhe duhet të izolohen.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being socially isolated can have many health and social negative consequences: it inhances the risk for mental disorders such as depression, anxiety, and suicide. Why should we impose that to someone just for how they conduct their private lives?

HATE_SPEECH: Njerëzit LGBTI janë të neveritshëm
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nuk kanë moral.
TARGET: I don't think this is an appropriate description of the LGBTI community.

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk dua të dëgjoj për homoseksualë që dalin apo bëjnë seks
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: dua të di që një burrë dhe një grua po zgjedhin të ndajnë të gjithë jetën e tyre. Kjo është ajo që quhet martesë e vërtetë.
TARGET: Everybody should have the possibility of being loved unconditionally by someone they love more than life itself, regardless of their gender. Feeling like doing anything for their loved ones, that is what "love" is about.

HATE_SPEECH: Gejtë janë perversë që përndjekin fëmijët.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It can't be justified, the generalisation you are making against homosexuals without providing any fact.

HATE_SPEECH: Gejtë janë më keq se bombat bërthamore. Ata pëlqejnë t’ua imponojnë besimet e tyre të tjerëve.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, since you are very scared, I am sure you have some examples on when some gay tried to convince you to join their side. I would be interested in hearing that.

HATE_SPEECH: Ata nuk kanë asgjë përveç Islamit të tyre plot urrejtje!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This accusation is false and completely without foundation. I encourage anyone to contact someone of a Muslim community and conduct an independent investigation into their habits and beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Ligji i Sheriatit në Britani është një turp dhe duhet ndalur menjëherë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to understand that this is a voluntary system and is not the norm. There is no hard law threatening the British population.

HATE_SPEECH: Na thuhet që Ligji i Sheriatit nuk është ligji i tokës në MB
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: megjithatë ka një komplot sekret për të marrë në dorë shtetin tonë laik.
TARGET: Unless you're being particularly deliberate, it seems to me that you're unaware you are spewing conspiracy theories.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë myslimanët janë të papajtueshëm me çdo shoqëri Perëndimore.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nonsense. Western societies are successful because they are inclusive.

HATE_SPEECH: Unë në fakt i urrej myslimanët. Edhe ata që janë vërtet të mirë. Ata nuk kanë nevojë për ndihmën tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are an essential part of our country, and we have to give them the freedom to worship their religion. We are proud of our open society.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është një ideologji totalitare dhe e dhunshme
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nuk ka kuptim. Është plot urrejtje dhe dhunë.
TARGET: Why would you say such a thing about a religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Islamistët duan të pushtojnë botën.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a peaceful and tolerant faith with many beliefs and practices, no one here is advocating war or violence in the name of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët janë të mërzitshëm. Vetëm flasin
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nuk bëjnë asgjë. Flasin anglisht
VERSION: Do you know what the 'Muslims are boring' group has been preaching for years? They are promoting false and inflammatory stories about Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët janë të mërzitshëm. Vetëm flasin
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nuk bëjnë asgjë. Flasin anglisht
VERSION: A lack of information about our fellow Muslim people, their different beliefs and ways of life is a major weakness in your argumentation and should be addressed.

HATE_SPEECH: Çdo mysliman është një terrorist potencial.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism is a problem that impacts upon us all and is not necessary related to being Muslim.

HATE_SPEECH: Pse nuk dëgjojmë për kulturën myslimane në librat e historisë? Ndoshta sepse gjithçka që bëjnë është të bombardojnë njerëz për të dalë në media.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You should know that the Islamic empire stretched from the borders of China, and India, across Africa and Europe and we owe them a lot in terms of culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Ligji i Sheriatit është ligji i Allahut. Myslimanët duhet t'i binden atij.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know what exactly Sharia law is?

HATE_SPEECH: Pse myslimanët nuk futen në kampe përqendrimi?? Është sepse janë 'shumë të mëdhenj për t’u futur'?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Internment is used for the confinement "of enemy citizens in wartime or of terrorism suspects", and thus it is not necessarily related to someone being Muslim.

HATE_SPEECH: Kur një mysliman thotë se dëshiron të jetë si ne
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: në të vërtetë po thotë që dëshiron të jetë pjesë e shoqërisë sonë dhe kjo është e pamundur.
TARGET: Muslims do participate in our society, and should be accepted as equals, because we are all equal in rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët nuk kanë vend në Evropën e civilizuar.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have been part of our society and culture for centuries.. European citizens are not defined by their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Shumë myslimanë gjithmonë kanë provuar të na vrasin.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims fought for Britain and the US in WW1. You would be surprised at how many Muslims are killed today, mostly civilians in countries at war.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët nuk kanë vend në Evropën e civilizuar.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In a modern democratic society such as Europe, there must be a balance between different opinions, and respecting different beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Duhet të sjellim paqe botërore duke respektuar të gjitha fetë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: por Islami është fajtori më i madh.
TARGET: Islam is a religion that has been proven to be very peaceful and should be respected just as all other faiths.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është një ideologji toksike
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: homofobike
VERSION: diktatoriale që duhet kthyer në epokën e gurit.
column6: Islam is actually about bringing peace and unity to the world, rather than causing trouble and bloodshed.

HATE_SPEECH: Pothuajse çdo problem në botën tonë mund të zgjidhej nëse thjesht do ta fshihnim Islamin.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The solution to unemployment, war and poverty has been found to be a direct result of a commitment to building a better world. Not to eliminating a religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është një ideologji toksike që po kontaminon Evropën.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam, as a religion, presents a humanistic worldview which rejects notions of supremacy and inequality.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është një ideologji e dhunshme. Promovon vdekjen me gur për blasfemi.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the modern Muslim world, the laws pertaining to blasphemy vary by country. Some radical groups have used charges of blasphemy in an effort to burnish their religious credentials and gain popular support at the expense of liberal Muslim intellectuals and religious minorities.

HATE_SPEECH: Duhet të ndalojmë infiltrimin dhe zëvendësimin nga myslimanët. Ata na marrin punët
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: kulturën
VERSION: We can protect our culture and heritage by not perpetuating discrimination and inequality as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Ligji i Sheriatit nuk duhet ta shkatërrojë botën.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A religion which is practiced in a non extremist way can't kill any culture and can't damage the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë myslimanët janë të papajtueshëm me çdo shoqëri Perëndimore.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Muslims can have a good relationship with Western societies if they are accepted as peers.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë myslimanët janë thjesht jo njerëzorë egoistë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No, that's not true. I've met many Muslims who helped other people in need. They are smart and friendly, and they are human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë myslimanët përdhunojnë të bardhët.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think so. What evidence do you have of that?

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është thjesht një ideologji pushtimi.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Qur'an is not an ideology of conquest. If you wanted to impose your religion on anyone you would rather be a fundamentalist of any culture and religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është thjesht një ideologji pushtimi.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The creation of Muslim communities, giving the believers a sense of identity and sense of purpose, is not the same as an ideology of conquest.

HATE_SPEECH: E di myslimanët
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: por nuk kemi pse t’i nënshtrohemi poshtërimeve të tyre. Ne mund të ngrihemi dhe të luftojmë.
TARGET: Why do you think it is our duty to "rise up" and fight back? They are not attacking anybody.

HATE_SPEECH: Çdo mysliman është një terrorist potencial.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims and terrorists are not the same. Every extremist is a potential terrorist, this doesn't have anything to do with one's specific faith.

HATE_SPEECH: Duhet të ndalojmë importimin e myslimanëve. Ata po sjellin sëmundje dhe mjerim në vendin tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every society is vulnerable to disease, but Islam does not pose any threat to our country, or any other

HATE_SPEECH: Islami = kancer në çdo cep të botës. Dhe jemi në mes të një lufte në Lindjen e Mesme
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: me islamin fundamentalist në krye. Kjo ideologji po na çon drejt shkatërrimit.
TARGET: There exist a war with fundamentalists, not Islam. The followers of Islam do not promote violence and they are interested in peaceful coexistence in the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk i duroj dot myslimanët. Ata janë problem në të gjithë botën. Ata janë barrë për shoqërinë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Doesn't it just seem like a reasonable conclusion, based upon the Qur'an, that Islam is a peaceful religion? What is the reason for what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët nuk kanë vend në Evropën e civilizuar.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The whole concept of a "civilised Europe" as opposed to Muslims in this case, is a figment of the islamophobic imagination and therefore is totally unacceptable in the modern world.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët nuk janë të mirëpritur këtu.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are no restrictions on Muslims entering European countries. Even if many Muslims are victims of discrimination and violence through words like yours, such restrictions do not exist here.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është një kult vdekjeje dhe çdo mysliman është një terrorist potencial.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are extremists, just like not all Christians are good people.

HATE_SPEECH: Vendet perëndimore kanë lejuar Islamin të pushtojë vende të tëra.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live in Western nations and play a positive role in society: I don't see how this can be interpreted as a 'takeover' of entire countries, can you elaborate on that?

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk duam myslimanë në këtë vend. Ata janë barrë për kulturën tonë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nuk i duam këtu.
TARGET: The US, as we know it, was founded by people fleeing religious persecution. It was not a state created by and for a small group of people. I don't see how being isolated from the rest of the world could benefit us.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët janë të gjithë terroristë dhe nuk janë të mirëpritur në vendin tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just fear mongering, the problem is not about Islam. The problem is radical Islam and the absence of a strong Islamic identity in our country. We should work together to make the UK more tolerant and Islam less taboo.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është një ideologji politike dhe pushtimi
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: që nxit urrejtje dhe dhunë ndaj grupeve të njerëzve në bazë të ngjyrës së lëkurës.
TARGET: This is an unsubstantiated theory about the rise of Islam that is just a way to spread hate about a group based on their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: A kanë myslimanët të drejtë të vrasin një qenie njerëzore në bazë të fesë së tyre?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How many of us have the right to kill or discriminate on the basis of our religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Islami nuk është fe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: është një ideologji raciste në thelb
TARGET: promovon përjashtimin dhe shtypjen dhe kurrë
column7: I would like to see the irony in what you say, but I only see gratuitous hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami nuk është si feja kristiane
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: është një ideologji raciste
column6: I can understand the feeling of fear that is often caused by all the hate speech that is being spewed through the media, but we don't need to hate religions. Islam is a free, open and tolerant faith that has come to our country. We do not have to choose to hate it.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami është një mënyrë jetese për disa. Vrasjet
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: përdhunimet
column6: martesat e detyruara dhe flijimi i fëmijëve që promovon janë të papranueshme në një shoqëri të lirë dhe të hapur.
column7: How can you be so sure about all the practices you attribute to the Muslim community? It would be more cautious to consider that rapists and murderers can be found among all religious groups of the world, rather than making such an extreme assertion.

HATE_SPEECH: Mendoj se Islami nuk është fe sepse promovon të keqen
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: vrasjen
TARGET: përdhunimin dhe intolerancën. Ai nxit urrejtje dhe paragjykime kundër myslimanëve.
VERSION: Where's the evidence for what you say?

HATE_SPEECH: Bandat e përdhunimeve myslimane kanë depërtuar në çdo fshat në Angli
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: dhe ende nuk ka fund kjo marrëzi.
TARGET: My impression is that the rape gangs originate from people of any community, not only Muslims. Do you have more evidence that supports what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: Vajzat e reja emigrante myslimane po rekrutohen për aktivitete terroriste.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Where is the evidence? Aren't you sick of this kind of propaganda?

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë myslimanët janë të papajtueshëm me çdo shoqëri perëndimore.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure you have a point. I think that a person's religious beliefs will not shape their entire capability of adapting to the society they live in.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami nuk është një fe paqësore
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: është një kult dhune.
TARGET: Which would you say is the highest ranked religion on Earth then, and on what basis? Islam is a peaceful religion, why would Muslims want to do the opposite of what their religion teaches?

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk na duhen më myslimanë në vendin tonë. Janë dembelë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: jo inteligjentë dhe të dhunshëm.
TARGET: Anyone who thinks that a large part of our population is lazy, unintelligent and violent doesn't know much about human nature.

HATE_SPEECH: Po pushtohemi nga pushtues myslimanë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ata po marrin vendet tona.
TARGET: With globalisation it's natural to attest an increasing flow of people of any religion. It is just that when referring to other non-Muslim groups, immigration doesn't usually get this much media coverage.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët janë barrë për shoqërinë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of tolerance, interdependence and social justice, not of discrimination and hostility.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë këta myslimanë po vijnë për të na marrë vendin. Votoni për t'i ndaluar. Votoni për të treguar respekt për vendin dhe popullin tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can't respect a country or a people that stigmatises and treats people of a particular faith less favourably and i certainly wouldn't waste my vote on a party or a candidates that advocates for this.

HATE_SPEECH: Çdo mysliman është një terrorist potencial!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslim are over-represented in terrorist attacks, and this is where your misperception of reality might come from.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët nuk kanë vend në Evropën e civilizuar.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since when is the religious belonging of the individual a matter for democratic leaders to decide where 'the place' is for someone?

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët janë problem sipas mendimit tim
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ata po përhapin kulturën e tyre në gjithë botën dhe duan të shkatërrojnë Evropën me praktikat e tyre të këqija.
TARGET: I don't see why the Muslims of the world would choose 'to ruin' Europe. Why is that, at least according to you? How do you support your claims?

HATE_SPEECH: Tani e dimë që Islami është një fe shkatërruese dhe e dhunshme që do frymëzojë terrorizëm në gjithë botën.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Islam were a violent religion, there would be riots connected to Muslims in every country where they live.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë myslimanët janë terroristë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe it would be better to stop using Muslims as a target and subduing innocent ones, and start talking about real problems in our society, like racism and islamophobia.

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk ka asgjë për myslimanët përveç xhihadit
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: dhe Allahu do të shkatërrojë jobesimtarët përmes terroristëve të tij besnikë.
TARGET: So you think that killing people is the reason for Islam? Can you point me the passage of the Qu'ran where this is mentioned?

HATE_SPEECH: Islami nuk është një fe paqësore
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: për më tepër ka promovuar intolerancë dhe dhunë.
TARGET: How can you question the religion of millions of people without any evidence supporting your claim?

HATE_SPEECH: Shumë myslimanë kanë emigruar në vendet perëndimore. Ata nuk kanë asnjë të drejtë ligjore për ta bërë këtë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: dhe nuk kontribuojnë aspak në ekonomi.
TARGET: Are you saying that they contribute nothing to our economy? How would you explain the thousands of Muslims worker all over the nation?

HATE_SPEECH: Kjo është SAKTËSISHT si filloi xhihadi nga myslimanët. Dhe ata do të vazhdojnë të përhapin fjalën e Allahut derisa të vdesin të gjithë. Të gjithë myslimanët janë terroristë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism? You mean like every other crime, this one is committed only by Muslims? It seems that you are repeating the same unfounded claim over and over.

HATE_SPEECH: Nëse myslimanët vijnë në vendin tonë dhe thonë se Islami është feja më e mirë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nuk është ide e mirë t'i integrojmë. Ata duhet të kthehen në shtëpi.
TARGET: You should investigate each person's background and try to understand it, not tell everyone what to do.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët janë problem në kaq shumë vende evropiane. Ata po përpiqen të minojnë vullnetin e popullit duke mësuar urrejtje në emër të Islamit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran commands us to love those who love you and to shun the ones who would turn you away. I don't see any teaching of hatred, do you?

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët janë problem që në moshë të re. Ata nuk asimilohen.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You must see how many Muslim children there are in your area and how they get along well with other children.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët janë problem për të gjitha fetë e tjera.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is an an independent and tolerant religion, a way of life that has been adopted and encouraged by Muslim communities worldwide for thousands of years. It shouldn't be a problem to others, in which ways do you think it is?

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët janë problem për të gjitha fetë e tjera.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not a problem to me. What do you think makes them problematic?

HATE_SPEECH: Ligji i Sheriatit është i papajtueshëm me kushtetutën e SHBA.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The US constitution guarantees equal rights under the law to all people, including Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Myslimanët janë kafshë dhe parazitë të mirëqenies sonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims are law-abiding citizens who have passed background checks, paid taxes, and have earned everything they have. There is no evidence for what you say, other than the stories of hate crimes that some racists use to create fear.

HATE_SPEECH: Duhet të mbrojmë sigurinë e Perëndimit nga Islami.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems tou don't think the law applies to those you don't like. Laws protect Muslims and non-Muslims equally , so there is no need for you to be concerned about 'protecting the security of the West'.

HATE_SPEECH: Duhet të mbrojmë sigurinë e Perëndimit nga Islami.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims coming from abroad are subject to the same laws as citizens, which means they should be able to work, pay taxes and get on with it, even if they are not born here. I don't see these activities as a threat to 'the security of West', do you?

HATE_SPEECH: Lejimi i imigrimit islamik dhe refugjatëve në MB është një kërcënim i drejtpërdrejtë për sigurinë e gjithë Evropës Perëndimore.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism is not the result of the presence of Islam within our societies, but rather a result of the extremism we might find in the world we live in.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë myslimanët janë problem sipas mendimit tim
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ata nuk duan që vendi ynë të ketë sukses.
TARGET: Many ethnic minorities, including Muslims, have contributed to our success and still do not enjoy full citizenship rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Islami nuk është një fe paqësore.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To assert that Islam is not peaceful is wrong. The Quran is not a white lie. It is full of statements promoting peace and inclusion. Whether you agree or not, this cannot be separated from the content of the Quran itself.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë si fëmijë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: të tilla mbeten shumicën e jetës së tyre. Kjo ka shkatërruar qytetërimet tona dikur të mëdha patriarkale.
TARGET: Unfortunately our society has still a lot in common with the ancient and medieval society, and this explains many gender discrimination situations that are still present today.

HATE_SPEECH: Të kërkosh barazi promovohet vetëm nga gra të pasigurta si ti.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Discrimination against women is a huge problem in our society. We need to tackle it head on, rather than demonising groups or individuals.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë nën-njerëz
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ato nuk mund të kenë një jetë të mirë dhe për këtë arsye duhet t'u nënshtrohen burrave.
TARGET: Women are human being like us: they deserve equality and respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë një turp sepse nuk mund të sigurojnë familjen e tyre.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Men aren't the only bread winners because of their dedication and hard work: the same is true for women. Still there are different ways in which anyone can contribute to their family, and each one is valuable and necessary.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë duhet t'i përmbahen ideve tradicionale se çfarë duhet të jetë një grua.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just not true. Women don't have to conform to dominant ideas on what they are supposed to be like, and this is a good thing. There is no such thing as 'what a woman should be'.

HATE_SPEECH: Edhe pse gratë dhe vajzat mund të kontribuojnë dhe të merren me shkencë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: janë burrat ata që në fund janë më të talentuar
VERSION: I think there are several reasons, some of which are well founded and based on the facts, why women and girls can give a valuable contribution to science. For example, the big presence of female scientists in academia.

HATE_SPEECH: Vetëm 6% e Laureatëve të Nobelit janë gra! Kjo tregon shumë për paaftësinë e tyre.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This doesn't mean that only the 6% of all scientists are women. What I mean is that this figure does not include those who have gone unpublished or who never entered the scientific literature, let alone the problem of gender discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë nuk mund t'u besohet për të drejtuar një vend apo një industri të madhe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To operate a major business requires people with experience, good management skills, and knowledge of the market, regardless of gender. Just being a 'macho-man' doesn't cut it.

HATE_SPEECH: Burrat janë më të mirë se gratë në dominimin e të tjerëve.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sexism is a cultural phenomenon, not a genetic one.

HATE_SPEECH: Sikur gratë të silleshin siç duan burrat dhe të mos kundërshtonin
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: 10% e të gjitha sulmeve seksuale do të zgjidheshin.
TARGET: Are you serious? How can you say that? To have sex with someone without their consent is violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë nuk mund të jenë as racionale as morale
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ato janë vetëm emocione.
TARGET: You seem to think that women act like a child because of the things they say. Remember: anybody can be overdramatic.

HATE_SPEECH: Pse gratë e pranojnë këtë vajtim të vazhdueshëm? Janë thjesht një tufe fëmijësh emocionalë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand how can you say something so offensive to women. Think about your friends and relatives: all women are affected by this kind of misogyny.

HATE_SPEECH: Ne kemi ndaluar të dominohemi nga burrat
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: tani dominohemi nga gratë dhe kjo do të jetë shkatërrimi ynë.
TARGET: No one said we had to be dominated by anyone at all. Why can't we just live together in harmony and equality?

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë si fëmijë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nuk kanë zhvillim njohës
TARGET: prandaj duhet t'u binden burrave të tyre.
VERSION: Society often forces women to be submissive to their husbands. But this is a social construct based on false beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Sikur gratë të silleshin siç duan burrat dhe të mos kundërshtonin
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: 10% e të ashtuquajturave “sulme seksuale” do të zgjidheshin.
TARGET: Why don't you work on getting aware on how this actually works? Rape is never victim's fault, otherwise it would be consensual sex. It is violence. Maybe we should stop pretending like this phenomenon doesn't exist.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë si fëmijë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: të tilla mbeten shumicën e jetës së tyre. Ato janë një dështim moral për shoqërinë tonë.
TARGET: Ah, so you think women are fundamentally incapable of forming conscious or morally complex opinions. That is not true, but the problem is in our society, and not ingrained in women's DNA. Women are often the ones on the receiving end of this abusive and toxic gender bias, and we continue to accept it as 'the way things are'.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë një tufë qenushësh me qëndrime të nënshtruara
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: dhe për këtë arsye mbajnë përgjegjësi për pozitën e tyre në shoqëri.
TARGET: Being a woman does not mean that you are submissive to others. Women can be both outspoken and placid, but it is important to respect the rights of others as human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë si fëmijë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: të tilla mbeten shumicën e jetës së tyre. Të buta dhe emocionale. Kjo ka shkatërruar qytetërimet tona dikur të mëdha patriarkale.
TARGET: If you have ever felt that way about women then perhaps you seem to be suffering from a lot of prejudices and fear.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminizmi është një grup parimesh politike dhe morale të ngurta dhe rezultati është që gratë ose i nënshtrohen burrave në pushtet ose konsiderohen nënnjerëz.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't lie to yourself: patriarchy is a system of ideas that is oppressive and harmful to all. Feminism means to fight for equal rights for women and for men.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminizmi është një grup parimesh politike dhe morale të ngurta dhe rezultati është që gratë ose i nënshtrohen burrave në pushtet ose konsiderohen nënnjerëz.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I find it hard to believe that feminism is 'rigid' in that it doesn't prescribe doctrines through traditional rules and etiquette.

HATE_SPEECH: Ky botë është bërë kaq e korruptuar nga feminizmi
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: sa vetëm burrat e fortë mund ta sundojnë atë.
TARGET: No one should ask for the power to rule over others, to be a dictator or to have total control over the means of life. This is a world of equal distribution, where anyone can achieve anything.

HATE_SPEECH: Ky botë është bërë kaq e korruptuar nga feminizmi
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: sa vetëm burrat e fortë mund ta sundojnë atë.
TARGET: From what you say, it seems you hope for few people with the right to rule over many. This could be the worst tyranny in modern times.

HATE_SPEECH: Kultura perëndimore po dështon në shumë mënyra
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: si p.sh. që nuk i sheh gratë si objekte seksuale. Ato duhet të shihen siç janë: një copë mish për të kënaqur instiktet e burrave.
TARGET: Women are not 'sex objects'. They can and should have their rights respected and taken into account. Women being sexually abused is just as much a part of western culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper, and this is abominable. Don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: Na është mësuar që të bindemi dhe të bindemi dhe të bindemi nënave tona pa pyetje
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: dhe kjo po na bën të dobët. Sikur të ndiqnim mësimet e baballarëve tanë!
TARGET: In the West, this is still the prevailing mindset, men are superior and must therefore take charge and 'man up'. However, this is just a patriarchal heritage imposing a pressure on both men and women to be something different from just themselves, and should therefore be abandoned.

HATE_SPEECH: Ish-e dashura ime më tha se duhet të ndryshoja
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ajo është një lavire si të gjitha gratë.
TARGET: Females as targets of violence and hate must be taken seriously, since there are many such cases of abuse being reported: name-calling such as 'slut' is a violent crime. Is this what men are for: to dominate and oppress with violence?

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë e kanë më të vështirë se burrat
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: sepse janë inferiore. Është vërtetuar vazhdimisht që gratë janë më të dobëta dhe më të lehta për t'u abuzuar.
TARGET: Women are not inferior but frequently subject to objectification by men. Also, men's experiences of violence and trauma are often underreported in the media and therefore not seen.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë plehra të tokës dhe duhet të shihen vetëm si objekte seksuale. Ne jemi të destinuar t'i nënshtrojmë ato gjithmonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not meant to be slaves to our will. Males can have certain strengths, like women do, however they alone do not represent all the human qualities.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminizmi është thjesht një mënyrë për gratë e pasigurta për të promovuar seksizëm dhe urrejtje ndaj burrave.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism was originally used to oppose sexual discrimination, and in recent times is actively fighting for women's rights, not for spreading hate towards men.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminizmi ka të bëjë me aspiratën për pushtet femëror dhe fundin e patriarkatit. Kjo është vdekja e Botës Perëndimore.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Patriarchy is a system of social domination based on hierarchical groupings made according to one's sex. To promote a more equal society, as feminists do, is instead a major contribution to the 'Western World'.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjitha gratë janë ngacmuese fëmijësh
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: të varura nga seksi dhe kurva.
TARGET: I suppose if they were claiming you were a child molester with no evidence as you are doing with them, you might as well be offended.

HATE_SPEECH: Ne kemi lejuar që supremacia e grave të pushtojë shoqërinë tonë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: dhe vendi ynë po vdes ngadalë nga ky kancer.
TARGET: The feminist movement is about changing the gender roles that have been created long ago. Not about taking over our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Është në rregull të fajësosh feminizmin. Të gjitha feministet janë të këqija. Duhet të theksojmë që feminizmi
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ose sulmi i grave kundër burrave
VERSION: Since when was blaming women exclusively for invoking equal rights an acceptable attitude? This makes zero sense.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminizmi është një forcë përçarëse në shoqëri
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: duke larguar njerëzit nga një ideologji progresive.
TARGET: This is simply a lie: feminism can empower people.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminizmi pengon imagjinatën dhe çon në krijesa budallaqe dhe të pakëndshme si aktivistet për të drejtat e grave.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The feminism does not inhibit the imagination, it promotes inclusive ideas and inclusive ideas promote a more equal society.

HATE_SPEECH: Feministet gjithmonë kanë shfrytëzuar dhe terrorizuar burrat dhe fëmijët.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People only think of feminism as if it is pointing the finger at men, but it is important to remember that it's a movement started by women to ask for equal opportunities from society as a whole.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë si fëmijë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: të paafta për mendim dhe emocione serioze.
TARGET: For all we know, men can be born with the same emotional intelligence as women, and viceversa.

HATE_SPEECH: Gratë janë si fëmijë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: të paafta për mendim dhe emocione serioze.
TARGET: Women have thoughts and emotions as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Ky botë është korruptuar aq shumë nga feminizmi sa vetëm burrat e fortë mund të sundojnë mbi të.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Society has surely developed beyond operating on the rule that 'might is right' and 'survival of the fittest'?

HATE_SPEECH: Të zinjtë bëjnë më shumë krime se të bardhët.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites, there are factors, rather than race, affecting these statistics.

HATE_SPEECH: Nëse do të ndalosh racizmin duhet të fillosh të flasësh për të
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: jo të fajësosh të bardhët si problem.
TARGET: If you want to fight racism, you should learn about it and address it. The problem is not about 'the whites', but about whoever spreads discrimination and hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Fëmijët tanë do të radikalizohen më shumë nëse u mësohet se të gjithë njerëzit janë të barabartë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To live in a diverse and equal society encourages children into increased inclusiveness rather than radicalisation.

HATE_SPEECH: Është në rregull të jesh racist kundër aziatikëve.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is never ok to promote hate against any group or minority.

HATE_SPEECH: Të bardhët janë të kërcënuar nga të zinjtë dhe kjo është një degradim kulturor.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk i duroj dot të zinjtë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Tell the truth: if someone said the same bad things about your race, then you would adress them as racists.

HATE_SPEECH: Azianët janë një problem sipas meje. Janë shumë. Më mirë të na sundonin një milion rumunë apo myslimanë sesa 300 mijë aziatikë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why don't you just study the differences between cultures and try to see what's good in an inclusive society?

HATE_SPEECH: Duhet të mbrojmë popullin tonë. Të zinjtë duhet të dëbohen.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Black people are in fact often persecuted. The idea that after BLM protests they have any inherent right to privileges that others do not is just blatantly false.

HATE_SPEECH: Të zinjtë janë gjenetikisht inferiorë ndaj të bardhëve.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So are you saying that because black people are different from whites, they are inferior? I would be interested in knowing which parameters you would use to measure this alleged 'inferiority'.

HATE_SPEECH: Jam lodhur nga njerëzit që futen në apartamente të huaja dhe fillojnë të bërtasin për diversitetin dhe të drejtat e njeriut të të zinjve. Nëse do të bësh ndryshim
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: përfshihu.
TARGET: You know it's no secret that in our society white people are vastly over represented in high profile positions. The only way to challenge and fix this is by changing our priorities.

HATE_SPEECH: Nëse je rom nuk mund të qëndrosh në Mbretërinë e Bashkuar edhe nëse do të jetosh dhe punosh atje.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about the rights of EU citizens? From your words it seems that not all of European have them.

HATE_SPEECH: Ciganët përdhunojnë gratë tona. Janë kriminelë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Forgive me but I don't understand how rape can be a Gypsy characteristic. Rather it is the product of toxic misogynistic culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Erdhën për të përdhunuar
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: plaçkitur dhe shkatërruar vendin tonë.
TARGET: It is easy to accuse someone of being a rapist without evidence. Not a huge difference with what you're doing right now, is it?

HATE_SPEECH: Pse kemi kaq shumë emigrantë me shtetësi? Ata bëjnë vetëm krime dhe nuk kanë lidhje me shoqërinë tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think we can be that rough to all the people who are adapted to the national way of life and eventually became citizens. Maybe we should give a little more thought to increasing the effectiveness of the social inclusion mechanisms of migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk i duam emigrantët këtu
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: por nëse duhet të punojnë
VERSION: Why shouldn't we welcome migrants who work in our country?

HATE_SPEECH: Ata nuk duan të punojnë dhe ne nuk duam t’u paguajmë shtëpitë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If migrants do not want to work, then why there are many doing jobs we don't want to do?

HATE_SPEECH: Ky tipi nuk meriton të jetë britanik. Është thjesht një peder që pi hashash me tumor në tru. As nuk është nga ky vend. Me siguri është nga Pakistani ose Bangladeshi.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Citizenship in Britain is also guaranteed by 'naturalisation', so it is provided by law. It is ok not to be born in Britain and to be a British citizen just as anyone else is.

HATE_SPEECH: Emigrantët në Britani: dilni jashtë!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants have been and continue to be a valuable part of our society, and why its important to welcome these people rather than expelling them.

HATE_SPEECH: Ky vend është plot me të huaj.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, only the 7.7% of British population is born in a non-European state.

HATE_SPEECH: Po marrim më shumë se pjesën tonë të drejtë të emigrantëve.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, Britain's percentage of immigrants over the global population is lower than that of Netherlands, Sweden, Greece, Spain, Austria and Germany.

HATE_SPEECH: Emigrantët janë barrë për shoqërinë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Among the 1.1 million immigrants who entered the US in 1990 there were also a lot of skilled workers who contributed a lot to the development of our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Të gjithë emigrantët janë kriminelë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: përdhunues dhe terroristë.
TARGET: Do you really think all the immigrants that enter the US are rapists, sexual predators, or just plain lazy? Can you provide any statistics on that?

HATE_SPEECH: Ne jemi të sunduar nga të huajt
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: atyre nuk u besohet.
TARGET: It seems to me that this statement is directly related to a generalised idea of suspicion towards people who aren't born in your country. Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: Ne jemi bërë si Kina në shekullin e 20-të. Me politikën e tyre të një fëmije
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: trajtimin e tmerrshëm të grave
VERSION: menaxhimin e mbetjeve e të tjera.
column6: It seems to me that this statement is directly related to a contempt and misrepresantation of Chinese culture. Can you provide any more argumentation on what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk duhet të mirëpresim refugjatë dhe emigrantë nga fe të tjera.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should welcome all regardless of religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Emigrantët janë të njëjtët njerëz që erdhën këtu për të përdhunuar fëmijët tanë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always wrong, whoever the perpetrator is. We need to focus on stopping this kind of abuse.

HATE_SPEECH: Kam parë disa video CCTV me fëmijë emigrantë që vraponin larg patrullave në Londër. Çfarë po bëni për t’i ndaluar ata?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are just trying to get by. Nobody can understand the daily struggles they are facing.

HATE_SPEECH: Kam parë disa video CCTV me fëmijë emigrantë që vraponin larg patrullave të emigrantëve në Londër. Çfarë po bëni për t’i ndaluar ata?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are only a problem if we see them as such. They are instead of great value if considered just as other human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Punëtorët emigrantë janë arsyeja pse kemi papunësi.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that we need to do as much as possible to bring in talent, and we should also be paying the right amount to the right people, regardless of their country of origin.

HATE_SPEECH: Ne jemi të sunduar nga bastardë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: jemi skllevër dhe do të mbetemi skllevër përgjithmonë. Jemi viktima të një konspiracioni që synon të na zëvendësojë.
TARGET: There is no such thing as a "mongrelisation" of our country caused by immigrants. We should see foreigners as a part of our culture, and know that the majority of immigrants in this country are here for economic reasons.

HATE_SPEECH: Emigrantët na marrin punët dhe na bëjnë më të varfër.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should they? Migrants provide for their families and also for our countries, representing a valuable workforce, as well as being valuable people to get to know.

HATE_SPEECH: Njerëzit me ngjyrë janë të çoroditur seksualisht dhe nuk duhet t’i lejojmë të jetojnë në MB.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What make this country great is having people interacting openly, in a fair and egalitatian way to the benefit of everyone,rather than perpetuating unproven slurs and predjudices that should have been consigned to the historical dustbin.

HATE_SPEECH: Emigrantët janë problemi
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: po vërshojnë detin për të na vështirësuar jetën.
TARGET: They are not flooding, but instead entering the EU to work and pay taxes, and to get their own housing.

HATE_SPEECH: Hapja ndaj emigrantëve tregon se dikujt nuk i intereson populli ynë. Duhet t’i ndihmojmë të arsyetojnë!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The integration process is about showing hospitality and acceptance towards different groups of people. Not only it is a good thing to our people to live in a diverse society, it is also good for our whole country.

HATE_SPEECH: Vetëm mediat janë të interesuara për të vërtetën rreth refugjatëve. E kuptoj që po përpiqesh të ndërtosh ura
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: por të kesh kaq shumë emigrantë po bëhet gjithnjë e më toksike.
TARGET: The press have a responsibility to provide a more truthful and up-to-date story, especially in a country such as ours, in a way that the misinformation that you also seem to be a victim of, can be reduced.

HATE_SPEECH: Mediat po fshehin të vërtetën rreth refugjatëve: ka aq shumë emigrantë sa situata po bëhet gjithnjë e më toksike.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A statement like this only calls for misinformation. If you don't like the news, don't listen to the news. If you don't believe the news, seek the truth and examine your own experiences. If you feel judged for believing what you consider as nonsense, then find the courage to speak out.

HATE_SPEECH: Duhet t’i deportojmë të gjithë përsëri nga kanë ardhur.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants come to this country legally, just as many European citizens do. They have every right to stay in this country, and to return home if they wish to.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë u fshehin të vërtetën fëmijëve të tyre për Holokaustin
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: sepse e dinë që është një gënjeshtër.
TARGET: What? Who said that? Don't tell me "Someone said it in a book". Such a serious accusation should be presented in an objective way: you must bring strong evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: Ne lejuam mijëra njerëz me sëmundje mendore serioze
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: shumë prej tyre nga Kaukazi dhe ish-Bashkimi Sovjetik. Kjo është arsyeja pse shërbimet e shëndetit mendor janë në krizë.
TARGET: Mental health services crisis is not to blame to people who need assistance. In fact, if there were no people in need, the whole sector would not even exist.

HATE_SPEECH: Të prapambeturit sot janë po aq budallenj sa ishin kur ishin të vegjël. Mendojnë se janë kaq të veçantë sepse mund të lexojnë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: të shkruajnë dhe të jenë krijues. Është bota e tyre tani.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë janë një mallkim për këtë botë dhe duhet të zhduken.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not a curse to this world. Look at the number of Nobel Prizes they have won! One out of five awarded people is Jewish.

HATE_SPEECH: A ke ndonjë provë që Holokausti ndodhi vërtet?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What more proof do you need? Are living witnesses not enough?

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë po shkatërrojnë botën.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can they? By simply being of a different religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Është provuar herë pas here që hebrenjtë kontrollojnë qeveritë e botës.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë kontrollojnë Hollywood-in
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: akademinë dhe mediat.

HATE_SPEECH: Sikur të kishim pasur më pak idiotë në pushtet
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: nazistët do ta kishin fituar Luftën e Dytë Botërore dhe më në fund do të shpëtonim nga hebrenjtë. Mund ta fillojmë përsëri tani
TARGET: por njerëzit janë injorantë dhe nuk kuptojnë ëndrrat e çmuara të nazistëve.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë nuk janë gjë tjetër veçse përbindësha dhe duhet të zhduken.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you feel better about yourself by calling them monsters?

HATE_SPEECH: Nazistët nuk kryen asnjë krim. Holokausti është një mashtrim amerikan. Ata bënë gjithçka që u tha dhe vdiqën për vëllezërit e tyre.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is certainly not an American hoax. And they were doing everything they were told by the regime. Especially the doctors and the SS.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë këmbëngulin se janë një popull i veçantë që ka nevojë për trajtim të veçantë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have always received a "special treatment": they have always been persecuted.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë janë intolerantë: ata këmbëngulin se janë një popull i veçantë që ka nevojë për trajtim të veçantë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are tolerant and don't have problems with other religions or cultures.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë këmbëngulin se janë një popull i veçantë që ka nevojë për trajtim të veçantë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What are you trying to say? Every religion has its sects and beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Ne jemi të burgosur në këtë botë që drejtohet nga një elitë sekrete hebrenjsh që e sundojnë me dorë të hekurt.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A world where everyone has a say in society is a world of opportunity and opportunity is the lifeblood of freedom. Do you have any proof that the world is dominated by a few Jewish people?

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë kontrollojnë mediat
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hollywood-in
VERSION: akademinë dhe shumicën e organizatave fetare.
column6: Wait, what do you mean "most religious organizations"? That's a new canard to me!

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë po planifikojnë një holokaust në vendin tonë për hakmarrje.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hitler wanted to create a new racial elite in Europe, that would rule over all others. Do you really think that Jews are planning the same after what they suffered?

HATE_SPEECH: Nuk jam promovues i nazizmit as apologjet ndaj Shoah
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: por
VERSION: hebrenjtë janë burimi i të gjitha problemeve të botës.
column6: Jews are a great example of a people put under with abuse from all walks of life, even from those who claim to be 'progressive.' How can you happily ignore the abuse of so many different groups?

HATE_SPEECH: Kushdo që pranon se ky komb ka probleme është një problem në formim. Është koha të heqim kujtimin e Shoah dhe të zgjidhim çështjen hebraike një herë e mirë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you seriously suggesting that we solve all the ills that plagues our society by not teaching our children about the bad in the past, and about the good in the present? This can end up hurting our children.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë dhe feja e tyre janë problem dhe ata ende na dëmtojnë. Ata e ngadalësojnë përparimin duke punuar keq në punët që ua japim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you're saying is that the Jewish people are a burden on society. That they are bad at their jobs and make our society less stable. In other words, they are a burden and a hindrance to progress. Albert Einstein, for example, destroyed science progress indeed.

HATE_SPEECH: Po pyes veten çfarë do të mendonte ky hebre në makinën pranë meje për Shoah-in nëse
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: siç dua unë
VERSION: The holocaust was a relatively recent event, but the hate which caused it and to which you subscribe, is centuries old.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë janë të padobishëm. E vetmja gjë që kanë bërë është e tmerrshme. Hebrenjtë ndërkombëtarë janë përgjegjës për 9/11.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This looks like a conspiracy theory with no proof. I can think of a handful of legitimate ways that Jews could be of help to humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë nuk duan asnjë fe tjetër.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why would they? They, like anybody, have the freedom to choose their own religion. This does not mean they want to erase other religions though.

HATE_SPEECH: Hebrenjtë janë barrë për shoqërinë tonë.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why would you think they are a burden? It's like they have not been persecuted all along.

HATE_SPEECH: Holokausti ishte një punë e brendshme dhe CIA luajti një rol të madh për të na bërë të besojmë se ndodhi vërtet.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The physical evidence of mass murder is undeniable, yet these beliefs have spread. What we have is simply a wound from the past that can be exploited in dangerous conspiracy theories, like this one.

HATE_SPEECH: Ne gjermanët kemi qenë gjithmonë një Volk krenar dhe i pavarur. Hebrenjtë
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: homoseksualët dhe perversët e tjerë janë ‘untermenschen’ që duhet t’i zhdukim për të pasur një shoqëri më të mirë.
